description: The MOSAICO Project focuses on reducing the risk of megafires in the Sierra de Gata and Las Herdes regions of western Spain. Led by the INDEHESA team at the University of Extremadura, the project aims to develop productive fire breaks through agroforestry and other land uses to re-establish a mosaic landscape. By promoting better land management practices and fostering community cooperation, MOSAICO seeks to mitigate the threat of wildfires while also generating economic benefits and preserving traditional agriculture. (https://www.mosaicoextremadura.es/)
